text: Don't sleep on this! This plugin unlocks a much better CSS experience that can include all of the PostCSS plugins your heart desires—nested like SASS, preset-env, advanced variables, etc.

Hello, I'm accessing this image in an array in a drag and drop template and everything is outputting correctly until I make it global. Can someone tell me why and how to access it correctly._`{# logo slider global#}`_
    `{% dnd_section padding={ right: 0, left: 0} %}`
          `{% dnd_module path='../modules/logo-slider-global-01'`
              `logos=[ {` 
                  `'src': get_asset_url('../images/sample-logo.png'),`
                  `'loading': 'lazy'`
                  `}`
                `]`
         `%}`
         `{% end_dnd_module %}`
    `{% end_dnd_section %}` (edited)

Hey All, an update on this after #developerday21

This now works without webpack!
<https://www.npmjs.com/package/@igomoon/HubSpot-fields-js-cli>
